title: So where are Zed's tattoos?
body: I remember a Rioter saying that Zed has shadow tattoos yet we dont see them on his arms or face so unless they're planning on him becoming shirtless and we see them on his chest and back its very weird that he doesn't have any. Plus wouldn't Zed the master of shadows have them all over his body atleast on his arms?

replies.body: Zed doesn't have a square centimeter of skin showing. How have you concluded that he has no tattoos?

There is a new comic series about Zed, which frequently shows him without his mask, yet he has no visible tatoos on his body.
For reference: This is how he looks like in the comic
https://euw.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/universe_header.jpg?itok=yk1StsBR

> [{quoted}](name=GreenLore,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=zYm0geG1,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2020-01-22T14:42:11.358+0000)
>
> There is a new comic series about Zed, which frequently shows him without his mask, yet he has no visible tatoos on his body.
> For reference: This is how he looks like in the comic
> https://euw.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/universe_header.jpg?itok=yk1StsBR

Have Rioters said that comics are canon? I think the only time I've ever even looked at one was when someone made a thread about how broken and unusable the reader site was and I wanted to investigate.

The Ashe, Lux and Zed comics are canon.
There were some other smaller comics that are canon too, like Namis, Ryze and Kai'sas.

According to WAAARGHbobo they will appear [later in the comic](https://twitter.com/Sharjamon/status/1220036860401082371?s=20). I do not disagree with you, the lack of the tattoo is really bothering me as well.

> [{quoted}](name=Lady Faceless,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=zYm0geG1,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2020-01-22T18:30:07.579+0000)
>
> According to WAAARGHbobo they will appear [later in the comic](https://twitter.com/Sharjamon/status/1220036860401082371?s=20). I do not disagree with you, the lack of the tattoo is really bothering me as well.

Thats good to know atleast Im just hoping its not just 1 tiny spot. Zed should be covered in them like Shadow Assassin Kayn
I was confused about this as well, I've read somewhere that he will get them towards the end of the comic, but I don't know if this is true or not.
Probably retconned or semi canon or who knows...
